create an A-Frame Web VR environment using the value returned from https://games.h4ks.com/game/dudeapi
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

take in a 64 character string in JSON format from https://games.h4ks.com/game/dudeapi and use it as the basis for the object colors and positions in your VR world
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

take in a new 64 character string in JSON format from https://games.h4ks.com/game/dudeapi every second, and use the data to update the object positions and colors in dudeworld
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

create a random color mapping for dudeworld where a-z A-Z 0-9 hyphen and period all map to specific RGB color values. get the new character string once per second from https://games.h4ks.com/game/dudeapi and use it to update the dudeworld VR world object colors
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

seed the dudeworld Web VR world with 10 random objects
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

display the current JSON values and update once per second
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

dudeworld is a Web VR world made in A-Frame. It retrieves JSON data from https://games.h4ks.com/game/dudeapi once per second, displays the current JSON values, and uses the JSON data to change the color values of 10 randomly placed, randomly colored cubes, once per second
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

dudeworld is a Web VR world made in A-Frame. It begins with 10 randomly colored cubes.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
